Let's get cooking!

We might be Jewish, but that doesn't mean we don't appreciate the traditions (and desserts!) of other cultures. Christians definitely got this dessert right. Adapted from Mary Berry's classic, this Yule Log recipe features some added decorations, an incredibly time saving hack, and more chocolate than you can imagine.

About Us

The Harel Sisters got the idea for this website out of love for cooking, eating, and sharing their classic family recipes. Sharing our best family recipes, because food is good!
